Html:
Hi EveryBody,
I have a problem using InitFramework and DestroyFramework methods. I got this error message:
"'RibbonLib.Ribbon' does not contain a definition for 'InitFramework' and no extension method 'InitFramework' accepting a first argument of type 'RibbonLib.Ribbon' could be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)"
when Intiializing ribbon framwork at form load
_ribbon.InitFramework(this);
what is wrong in my code?
